products.name: Wireless Mouse
products.Description: A sleek and ergonomic wireless mouse designed for both comfort and precision. Perfect for extended computer use with smooth tracking and a long-lasting battery.

products.name: Mechanical Keyboard
products.Description: A high-quality mechanical keyboard offering tactile feedback and durability. Ideal for gamers and typists seeking a responsive typing experience with customizable RGB backlighting.

products.name: Laptop Stand
products.Description: An adjustable laptop stand that promotes better posture and cooling. Its lightweight and portable design makes it easy to carry and set up anywhere.

products.name: USB-C Hub
products.Description: A versatile USB-C hub that expands your laptop's connectivity options. Includes multiple USB ports, HDMI, and card readers to accommodate various peripherals and devices.

products.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.Description: Premium noise-cancelling headphones that provide an immersive audio experience. Designed to block out ambient noise and deliver crystal-clear sound for a more enjoyable listening experience.

products.name: Power Bank
products.Description: A compact and high-speed portable SSD with 1TB of storage. Ideal for quick data transfer and secure storage of important files, offering fast read and write speeds.

products.name: Smartphone Holder
products.Description: A sturdy and adjustable smartphone holder that securely holds your device at the perfect angle. Great for hands-free video calls, watching movies, or following recipes.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.Description: A portable Bluetooth speaker with rich sound quality and a long battery life. Perfect for enjoying your favorite music or podcasts anywhere you go.

products.name: External Hard Drive 2TB
products.Description: A high-capacity external hard drive with 2TB of storage. Provides ample space for backing up files, photos, and videos, and features reliable data transfer rates.

products.name: Gaming Chair
products.Description: An ergonomic gaming chair designed for comfort during long gaming sessions. Features adjustable armrests, lumbar support, and a reclining backrest for maximum relaxation.

products.name: 4K Monitor
products.Description: A high-definition 4K monitor that delivers stunning visuals and crisp details. Ideal for professional work, gaming, or streaming with accurate color reproduction and wide viewing angles.

products.name: USB Webcam
products.Description: A high-resolution USB webcam with clear image quality and built-in microphone. Perfect for video conferencing, streaming, or creating content with ease.

products.name: Wireless Charger
products.Description: A sleek and efficient wireless charger compatible with most Qi-enabled devices. Provides fast and convenient charging without the need for cables.

products.name: Smart Light Bulb
products.Description: A smart light bulb that offers customizable lighting options. Control brightness and color temperature with your smartphone or voice assistant to create the perfect ambiance.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.Description: A stylish fitness tracker that monitors your daily activity, heart rate, and sleep patterns. Provides insights into your health and fitness goals with real-time notifications and tracking.

products.name: Drone with Camera
products.Description: A high-performance drone equipped with a high-resolution camera for capturing breathtaking aerial footage. Includes GPS, multiple flight modes, and an intuitive control system for easy operation.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.Description: A feature-rich smartwatch that tracks your fitness, notifications, and more. Offers a range of health-monitoring features, customizable watch faces, and integration with your smartphone.

products.name: Tablet Stand
products.Description: A versatile tablet stand that allows for multiple viewing angles and secure placement. Ideal for hands-free use while watching videos, reading, or video calling.

products.name: HDMI Cable
products.Description: A high-speed HDMI cable for connecting your devices to your TV or monitor. Supports high-definition video and audio for an optimal viewing experience.

products.name: Laptop Cooling Pad
products.Description: A laptop cooling pad designed to improve airflow and prevent overheating. Features built-in fans and an adjustable stand to enhance cooling efficiency and comfort during use.
